subtasks: Harvest remaining seeds from existing herbs
Move cold frames closer to the house after walnut tree fell
Chip the area around the cold frames

Fill cold frame containers with soil
Plant cold-hardy herbs in the cold frames for fall

tasks.task: Address dizziness and discomfort when driving
subtasks: Acknowledge the onset of lightheadedness and physical restrictions when moving
Plan soil transport and cold frame setup despite dizziness
Drive carefully up the hill while managing symptoms

tasks.task: Prepare soil and plant cold frames
subtasks: Position compost in cold frames for planting

Ensure proper spacing and coverage of plants in cold frames
